channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect 15

item.title: CVE-2023-44153|2024-08-02T19:59:51.619Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to cleartext storage of sensitive information in memory. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 35979.
